alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Utah Valley; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 4:57PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Juab and southwestern Utah Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 457 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rocky Ridge to 15 miles southwest of Nephi. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Provo, Payson, Nephi, Orem, Spanish Fork, Pleasant Grove, Springville, American Fork, Lindon, Santaquin, Mapleton, Salem, Elk Ridge, Woodland Hills, Rocky Ridge, Vineyard, Palmyra, Lake Shore, Benjamin and Spring Lake. This storm will be capable of producing strong gusty winds on Utah Lake. This will lead to a sudden increase in waves and very choppy waters which will result in hazardous boating conditions. Boaters are urged to seek safe harbor if possible. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 212 and 271, and between mile markers 274 and 277. US Route 6 between mile markers 121 and 183. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Utah Valley; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Millard and Juab Counties
